meanings.definition: The act of glorifying or the state of being glorified.
meanings.sent1: The glorification of heroes in stories inspires us to be brave.
meanings.sent2: The glorification of nature in paintings captures its beauty.
meanings.sent3: The glorification of a simple sandwich as a gourmet meal made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The glorification of the sunset as a painting in the sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The glorification of kindness in the community made it a better place.

meanings.definition: The representation of something as more splendid than it is.
meanings.sent1: In advertisements, the glorification of products can be misleading.
meanings.sent2: The glorification of a regular garden as a paradise is common in poetry.
meanings.sent3: The glorification of a tiny pebble as a precious gem was amusing to see.
meanings.sent4: The glorification of a small victory as a grand achievement was exaggerated.
meanings.sent5: The glorification of a simple melody as a masterpiece was surprising.
